body.p: Because the Board’s intention was not to reconsider the fundamental approach to related party disclosures established by IAS 24, this Basis for Conclusions discusses only the following requirements in IAS 24:

li.p: related party disclosures in separate financial statements (paragraphs BC11–BC17);
definition of a related party (paragraphs BC18–BC32);
other minor changes made in 2009 (paragraph BC49).
